sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-app>
        <ion-header translucent>
            <ion-toolbar>
                <ion-title>iBuy</ion-title>
            </ion-toolbar>

        </ion-header>
        <ion-content fullscreen>
            
            <ion-searchbar placeholder="Escreva sua lista" class="outputInput" >
                <ion-icon name="add-outline">
                    <ion-button color="light">Inserir</ion-button>
                </ion-icon>
            </ion-searchbar>
            
            <ion-item>
                <ion-input enterkeyhint="search" type="search" placeholder="Escreva sua lista"></ion-input>
                <ion-button class="outputButton" color="light">Inserir</ion-button>
                <ion-label class="outputUl"></ion-label>
           </ion-item>    

            <ion-item>
                <ion-checkbox color="tertiary" >
                    <ion-label>{{ insertBuy }}</ion-label>   
                </ion-checkbox>
                
            </ion-item>

        </ion-content>
        
    </ion-app>
</template>

<script>
import { IonSearchbar, IonApp, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem, IonButton, IonInput } from '@ionic/vue';
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

export default defineComponent({
    name: 'InsertItems',
    components: { 
        IonSearchbar,  IonApp, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem, IonButton, IonInput
    },
    data() {
        return{
           //insertBuy: null, 
           list: document.querySelector('.outputUl'),
           searchInput: document.querySelector('.outputInput'),
           //searchBtn: document.querySelector('.outputButton'),
           myHistory: [],
        }
        
    },
    methods:{
        //list.innerHTML = '',
        insertItems(){
            let searchBtn = document.querySelector('.outputButton');

            if(searchInput.value !== ''){
                myHistory.unshift(searchInput.value);
                list.innerHTML = '';

                for(var i = 0; i < myHistory.length; i++){
                    itemText = myHistory[i];
                    var listItem = document.createElement('ion-label');
                    listItem.textContent = itemText;
                    list.appendChild(listItem);
                }
                searchInput.value = '';
                searchInput.focus();
            }
        }
    },
});


</script>

<style>
    ion-searchbar{
       --border-radius: 20px;
    }
    
</style>
